title: Logging 10,000 Years into the Future
summary: At the beginning of the martial dao, abnormal beasts invaded the world. Humanity’s martials had to retreat in defeat time and time again. Lu Sheng transmigrates to that time, but in his dreams he enters a world 10 000 years later. The foundational body refining method from 10k years in the future is several thousand times more effective than the current one. Then there’s the breathing method, body refining pill formula, and sacred martial law from 10k years later… Despite developing martial arts for 10k years, humanity was annihilated! Their martial arts civilization reached the apex, and yet there was no one left to inherit it. Except Lu Sheng, he’s exactly that last spark of hope!

title: Don’t Mess with a Deadly Revenger [Official]
I randomly have a new career every week
summary: After being fired from his company, Lin Yi accidentally gets the All-Pro Experience System. Lin Yi relies on the various career arrangements and generous rewards given by the system to achieve his ambition and path to wealth step by step, becoming the ultimate all-powerful big brother who dominates the world.

title: The Almighty Daughter Runs The World
summary:
After traveling through time and space, Ye Zhuo became a fake daughter of a wealthy family and a notorious bastard that everyone disdained. But so what? Although Ye Zhuo was dealt a bad hand, she would still win.

Ye Zhuo quickly made room for the real daughter of the wealthy family and then helped her mother and uncle get rich overnight.

As an unparalleled talented woman, she became the head of a technology firm and had a fortune of hundreds of billions of dollars, directly reaching the pinnacle of her life! Meanwhile, she was having a relationship with a wealthy tycoon who always doted on her!

title: Mr Mo’s Secret
summary: A father who mysteriously disappeared, a mother who killed herself and clues that lie in a web of secrets. To find the truth, I decided to make an unspoken transaction with Mr. Mo, the most powerful man in the city. Who would have thought that a sweet man could be summoned with a kiss! One moment as cold as frost, one moment as hot as a stove, a boyfriend with such duality, I want it all. The quirky girlfriend vs a two-faced catlike tycoon, under the stars, till the end of time, I will only love…

title: Evolution Begins With A Big Tree
summary:
Reborn as a willow tree!? Resurrection of spiritual energy, rise of all things. The reborn willow has also embarked on the path of evolution. It can evolve infinitely, is it “divine power” or “curse”?

Official Translations:
[Japanese](https://piccoma.com/web/product/146958)

title: Serpent Ancestor
summary:
In a village, an old snake inadvertently swallowed a cultivator's human-shaped pill, gaining intelligence and setting off on the path of cultivation. With only a brief decade to live, the snake does not fear the passing of time but makes the most of every moment.

This is the tale of an old snake's journey to immortality.

title: I Regressed to Level Up Instead of Being a Simp
summary: After failing the college entrance examination and being cheated on, Han Li, who achieved nothing after graduation, made a wish to heaven: "I wish... to go back in time..." Thus the Consumer System appeared and Han Li regressed to the age of eighteen! Not enough skills? Upgrade them with points! Looks too ordinary? Fix that mug with some points! The rich classmate who always looked for trouble taught him a lesson, and captured the hearts of the goddesses... With this regression, let's witness how Han Li counterattacks and rises to the heavens!

title: Goddess’s Way of Attacking Tigers
summary: Moha, the sun god, was betrayed by her lover and died a miserable death. She realizes that she has returned to her past a year ago while being possessed by the body of an unknown woman. Moha struggles to prevent the tragedy of her past life. But, unexpectedly for her, her two tiger gods, who belonged to her in the past, spread their fervent courtship towards her.

title: Steal the Child of the Terminally Ill
summary: “Are you going to leave your child with a terminally ill mother?”The future that the magic mirror, a relic from my parents, showed me was horrifying. A future where I would be a terminally ill mother and my husband’s mistress would demand that I leave my child behind. We’re not even married yet, so maybe we can avoid that unhappy future. You, who resemble the cold snowy fields of the north, cannot hold me. So why are your eyes so hot as you look at me as we speak of parting?”When the old duke dies, we will part ways.””If we don’t have kids, we’ll be fine, right? So don’t even think about divorce. Just stay by my side.”I felt the warmth of your lips on mine as you carefully moved closer. But the deep kiss was just the beginning of a long night ahead.

title: Disaster Is Always Nearby
summary: Everything seems perfect in Dami Yun's life. Her career prospects look bright, and her childhood crush Ho-won even moved back to Korea to confess to her. But her world turns upside down when an anonymous letter leads her to a mysterious house, where she ends up trapped for three hours… except in the outside world, a decade has passed and Dami has been declared dead! Can Jaenan, the mysterious, surly god and owner of the home, help her navigate this chaos? Why does disaster strike wherever she goes? And why is this unhelpful god having prophetic dreams about them being together?!

title: Newcomers Turn Low at Night
summary: No summary available.

title: Book of the Dead
summary: Percival, a kind boy, lives with his grandfather in a remote place called "God's Finger". However, the world will not allow him to live in peace. An encounter with a mysterious knight changes their fate, and a shocking secret is revealed. The boy sets out on an endless journey.

title: Thiendavis – For The Perfect Salvation
summary: Evie Ariatte, a lovely saintess candidate, has her bright future shattered when a sudden curse forces her to answer every question with the truth. This unexpected twist of fate threatens her reputation and jeopardizes her dream of becoming the saintess. As her blunt honesty earns her both friends and enemies, will Evie uncover the hidden truths of Thiendavis and bring about its perfect salvation?

title: This wild mouse has taken Cinderella
summary: After marrying the prince, Cinderella’s “happily ever after” ends when he falls for another woman and proposes to her. A small, powerless field mouse, who dearly loves Cinderella, wishes she could smile again. Mysteriously, the mouse dies and wakes up in the past, when Cinderella was still mistreated by her stepfamily. Then comes a twist: the mouse isn’t ordinary, but a noble beastman from the prestigious Field Mouse clan. With her true identity revealed, she decides to run away with Cinderella — before the prince and his glass slipper ever show up.

title: Demon King Who Lost His Job
summary: He is the Demon King who was impeached. She is the brave hero who was laid off because of a failed expedition. Bound by destiny, the two of them embark on an adventure to repay their debts.

title: Auto-Hunting With Clones
summary:
Sangwoo, an average sophomore in college, always dreamt of having multiple versions of himself - one for study, another for play.

One day, he awakens with a skill called [Cloning], and Sangwoo thinks his dream has come true. But will cloning really steer his life in the direction he had hoped for, or does fate have other plans in store?

title: Maru is a Puppy
summary:
The hero's son and the ghost of the Demon King are the master and disciple!?

Earth, the son of Hero, the hero who defeated the Great Demon King, is troubled.
Always expected to achieve great things, but unable to meet those expectations.
No matter the effort he puts in, and the results he obtains, it's never enough.
“You're a disappointment compared to your father.”
“Don't you know you're the son of the hero!!”
Living every day like this, Earth meets his destiny in the room containing his father's sword.

“Interesting. I will train you. I have only free time now.”

Earth receives special personal training from the Demon King just to get back at his parents and the world.
In the coming days, his parents, the heroes of the past, his first love, his princess childhood friend, the geniuses of the era, and the world will tremble before him.

**Note:** While initially released with the “What's Wrong With The Hero's Son Being The Demon King's Disciple?” subtitle, in line with the web and light novels, the manga switched to the new “Boy Meets Satan” subtitle by the release of the 1st volume.
___
**Character Designer:** [Ryuutetsu](https://mangadex.org/author/796d659c-1d83-4956-a7bb-d0bcf8424284)

**Additional Links:**
- Official Raw Web Novel: [Kakuyomu](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/1177354054918478427), [Shousetsuka ni Narou](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9185fm)

title: The Way That Knight Lives As a Lady
summary:
The sword of my closest friend and trusted adjutant pierced my body. When I opened my eyes again, I had become a noble lady of the enemy kingdom. In an unfamiliar and weak stranger’s body, three year’s time was lost, in which my homeland was brought to ruin. I was unable to come to my senses because of the pain of betrayal and confusion of my identity. However, eventually I decided to live on as 'Luciphella Aidine', a noble who wields a sword.  


---

title: Home Plate Villain
summary: To meet his dead parents again, Hong Bin made a deal with the Baseball Fairy, who agreed to return him to the past if he achieved 3,000 career hits as a baseball player. And at the age of 40, Bin the baseball legend hits his last ball and goes back in time. After reuniting with his family, Bin decides to pursue his old dream of joining the major league. The only issue is that he's lost all his old skills as a pro! But will his past experiences be enough to help this legend fulfill his new goal?

title: All Football Talents Are Mine
summary: Uho-yeong had dreamed of becoming a soccer player. However, he was not blessed with the talent and died without realizing his dream, struck by lightning. It was then that the demon Mammon appeared, offering the ability to covet everyone's talents...

title: Look-Alike Daughter
summary: Beautiful and intelligent, Somyung Gil has tirelessly strived to fulfill her mother's vision of the perfect daughter. However, when her less-than-perfect younger brother is tragically found drowned in a river, doubts plague Somyung's heart. She begins to suspect that their mother might be responsible for the unspeakable act. From then on, her paramount goal becomes escaping her mother's grasp, while all her mother wants is for Somyung to experience the perfect life she herself was denied. Will Somyung ever truly find her freedom?

title: Superstar From Age 0
summary: After being reborn for the umpteenth time, 7-month-old Lee Seojun finally gets the chance to fulfill his original dream of becoming a superstar actor! Using magic abilities from his past lives, baby Seojun captivates his playmates and becomes an overnight sensation with a viral mukbang video that helps fussy kids eat. Soon, he's shooting a baby food commercial, and his uncle's entertainment company is knocking at his door... but will Seojun be able to keep up the magic to match the demand?

title: Aristocrat’s Revenge
summary: No summary available.

title: A Former S-rank Adventurer Who Was Betrayed By His Griends Because He Was Too Strong Wants to Live a Slow Life in The Countryside
summary: Luke Othyde, the kingdom’s strongest S-rank adventurer, was executed by his own comrades for being too strong. A few months later, a man in a black helmet appears in a remote village, possessing powers greater than Luke’s. His name is Lugo. Due to his extraordinary powers, those around him view him with suspicion, but despite that, the strongest man wrapped in mystery enjoys the best slow life!

title: Frozen Apocalypse: No Chance of Survival
summary: The stars shift, the blizzard persists, the icy apocalypse is imminent, food! Temperature! Violence! Dependence! In this dilemma, under the distortion of human nature, has desire given birth to monsters? How to break out of adversity and find a way to survive!

title: The Cop Is Too Strong
summary: Haise is a young boy who has been gifted with an unknown ability. He becomes an adventurer together with his childhood friend Sasha, but is kicked out of the team for being unable to use his ability and being a hindrance. Furthermore, while continuing his solo adventure, he is caught in a trap and falls into dire straits. Just as he is on the brink of death, Haise's ability "Weapon Master" awakens! It is a power that shakes the laws of the world, summoning weapons from another world! ? An unrivaled fantasy set in another world that begins with adversity!

title: Worthless Profession: Dragon Tamer
summary: Combining reality with a gaming world where ferocious beasts roam freely, filled with numerous mysteries and dungeons. In order to defend against the onslaught of these beasts, everyone undergoes class transfers and crazily levels up. On the day of his transfer, Lu Fan becomes a hidden class – Dragon Tamer. However, due to the immense strength of dragons, it is deemed impossible for anyone to tame them, earning Dragon Tamer the reputation of being the most useless class. Fortunately, he awakens the Super Treasure Map System. As Lu Fan, with his mighty dragon, sweeps through everything, the entire world trembles.

title: I Became The Black Swan Mother of The White Swan Princess
summary:
The transmigration that happened to others happened to me, too. I’m pretty sure I’m now a supporting character… but exactly which novel is this?

When I opened my eyes, I was a widow with stepdaughters my own age, and not only that, I turned into a black swan every night due to a dark curse! Holding back my tears, I decided to take charge of my fate…wait, why should I? Why So Serious?

A duchess during the day, a queen of the lake during the night – I have the best luck to be able to leisurely float around! Life should be lived unplanned! When I had just about decided to live my life like this, a white baby swan, one that was not in my no-plan life plan, came to me.

“Mommy, are you really my mommy?”

What, you were a person? And even the youngest sibling of the tyrant emperor?

“I’m not your mother! Can’t you tell by the different colors of our feathers?”

I’m a black swan, you’re a white swan! But why is she so crazy cute. Can our mother-daughter love endure the obsession and persecution of this child’s seven brothers, including the tyrant emperors?

title: Highteen Spoiler
summary: After giving up Taekwondo for over 10 years, Sohee, who lives like a hanryang, has only one interest... k-teen romance! I dream of a future where I will become a lover with 'Soo-hyeon', who is going well. but… One day, So-hee's cell phone syncs a photo that is presumed to be the future, and the boy who became her lover in the photo... It was Lee An-do, an unlucky classmate! can not believe it! There is no probability in this love affair! Even after that, So-hee is confused by the more and more pictures of the future... Will it flow according to the spoiled ending?

title: Close and Secretive
summary: On that day, I was going to confess to you. Choi Ji-young, an unidentified woman who accidentally encountered her on Ulleungdo Island. Sunwoo Hyun keeps bothering Ji-young. Two people who are attracted to each other even in a short period of time. Then one day, Ji-young suddenly disappears. Without a trace. “It’s been a while, Hyun. Aren’t you going to say hello?” Ji-young, who could not be found no matter how much she visited, became the “Choi Ji-an” and appeared in four years. That’s also for Hyun to protect. “With this time, there is no Choi Ji-young I knew. So, just delete it too.”

title: Living with My Favorite Person is Too Precious
summary:
Hajun, a member of the popular K-pop idol group "HANURu", had gone on hiatus for military service. But even after his discharge, there were no signs of his return—leaving fans restless and anxious.

Nana, a devoted fan of Hajun, continued supporting him while secretly worrying about his absence. However, after her parents' sudden remarriage, she was forced to move out of her home.

With no other choice, she headed to the new place her parents had arranged—only to find none other than her bias waiting there!?

title: No, I Only Charmed the Princess!
summary:
“Elvira Von Lustro. I can’t accept you as a saint! The ‘Maiden Lily’ you were growing was a fake! You fake saint!”

Prince Alexander cursed me like that. Everyone shouted in surprise.

“Elvira is not the saint?”

“There must be some mistake.”

There is no doubt about it. I was supposed to be recognized as a legitimate saint in this ceremony. But then, all of a sudden, he called me a fake saint. Furthermore, Prince Alexander declared,

“I can’t marry a woman who isn’t a saint! Your betrothal is forgotten!”

Then, for the first time, I opened my mouth.

“ーYes, I understand.”

title: I Became the Emperor’s Cat
summary:
After my sudden death, I was reincarnated in a strange world with a sultan and his harem, but not as a person, but as a kitten who can't talk!

I can only become human by kissing a prince who is worthy of the sultan...

After mistaking me for an assassin and treating me coldly, Prince Soliman says, "......It's soft, it's warm, can we stay here for a while?" as he approached me.

Prince Theron, who I thought was a sweetheart, seduces me by whispering, "Choose me over my brother, and I will give you everything you want." "I will give you everything you want," he whispered, seducing me.

I can't stay human unless I kiss one of them. "Nyaaong!" (Headache!)
How do I survive in this royal palace?

title: Marry In Bed At 19
summary: “As a birthday present, i'll give you my boyfriend.” Me Ahyeon and the top actress Seong Si-eun, seem like the closest and best friends in the whole world. While Si-Eun is a bright and famous star, Ahyeon is known as “the girl you can ask any favor". At Ahyeon's birthday party, Si-eun announces that she's bringing her boyfriend. And then, Ahyeon realizes that she was talking about Nam Terry, a guy who has always hated her... Can they share a boyfriend while preserving their friendship? No matter what you do, he says that “I'll never be able to like you.”

title: How Far Are You Okay With?
summary: “If it’s okay with you, Noona… Do you want to do that thing I just saw with me?” Eunpyeong finds it difficult to start dating because of painful memories. Nyuk, her underclassman from the same department, approaches her but Eunpyeong finds it hard to accept him. One day, Nyuk walks Eunpyeong home because she is drunk. At her house, he makes an unexpected discovery and a bold suggestion…

title: My Introverted Boy
summary: Do you ever wonder what the most popular boy at school is really like? As it turns out, he might be just as awkward and shy as any of us. That’s what wallflower Jayu Nam begins to discover after a chance encounter with Jahyeok Yeo, a boy in her class who seems to excel at everything in life. Well, almost. Underneath Jahyeok’s persona is a secret super-introvert who would rather just stay home, except his charming good looks keep forcing him into social situations. Together, Jayu and Jahyeok begin to learn a little something about friendship and maybe more…

title: Predatory Marriage
summary:
Lea wrote a suicide note ahead of the wedding.
Because she'll die after the first night.

It was the miserable end of a princess who devoted her entire life to her country and the royal family.
Before she gives up her life, Lea plans her final revenge on the royal family.

It is to become a new bride who has lost her innocence.

"Why did you give up your first experience like this? Don't you want to run away?
"I... want to die."

It was an impulsive remark because he was just a one-night stand.
I thought it was meant to end like that.
Until we meet again in an unexpected place.

He eroded her orderly daily life.
Despite knowing it was a dangerous relationship, she couldn't resist him.
What on earth is that man thinking?

"You don't remember?"
The man said with a fierce smile.

"I told you I'd ruin your life."

title: I Thought It’s a Common Possession
summary: I was the villainess who would die at the hands of the male lead, but I know this is a cliché! I thought it was a pretty good deal to die unjustly, as a payment for the price I paid for being the villainess. Until I realized that I couldn’t escape from the original plotline. If I was going to die anyway according to the original, then let’s give a kiss to my handsome husband!… Why did the original plot start to change?

title: Killer Peter
summary:
After devoting his life to the crime organization, Glory Club, Peter retires his status as a legendary killer and spends his remaining days running a quiet used bookstore.

But after being ambushed and nearly killed one day by the very organization he dedicated his life to, Peter finds his body magically reverted back to its teenage years!

Now that Peter is back to his peak physique, he sets out to settle the score with Glory Club!

---

**Official Translations**

title: The Monster Duke Mistook Me for His Wife
summary: No summary available.

title: I Became a Dead Character in a Prison for Wastes
summary:
I reincarnated into a novel… but, hey… What am I supposed to do if I reincarnate in 10 years before the novel begins?

The location: prison. The problem is that even a jungle is better than this place!

After ten years finally passed, I became the top dog in this prison. 

*
“Hey Mint. Cut it out. Don’t go overboard.”

“I have no idea what you’re talking about.”

I became a good-for-nothing leader, but I’m fine with that. That’s a privilege a pro gets. 

“I’ll make you dead on paper, so do me one last favour.”
“I have no idea what you’re on about.”

A golden opportunity was bestowed upon me. 

“If you help me, I’ll release you from prison.”
“What do you want me to do, Master?”
“...”

The chief of the prison asked me, the psycho of the prison, for a favor.

“Make the new guy coming into the leader of this prison.”

It may be called a prison, but in reality, it’s a lawless place. If I can make one man into the leader, I can finally be released.

“But to do that, you need to enter a male prison.”
“...Huh? How can I attach something that’s not there and get in?”

But oh god? The new guy is the male lead of the original novel.

title: I don’t believe in my twin sister
Will you expose yourself today?!
summary:
Mini is a "Scum Detector", and her latest job is from a rich girl who wants to test her boyfriend's loyalty. However, her boyfriend, Zhao Yueming, is a straightforward gentleman, and Mini's usual methods don't work on him. This is a bit tricky for Mini, who is used to dealing with scumbags regularly. This game of tug-of-war between the womanizer and the one who understands them best is about to begin. Who will fall into the trap of love first?!

[Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0003618)
[Official Korean Translation](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=12220642)

title: I Want To Be Fooled
summary:
A proper villain must be ruthless and evil, a bringer of death! Having tormented the protagonist to his heart's content, he makes a brilliant exit. Once he's finished his work, he goes out with a bang.
Wang Yi was determined to be that kind of villain. Unfortunately… His male lead can read minds. (:з)∠*)
“You mongrel!” Mr. Wang chuckled as he looked down on the novel’s male lead.
Suddenly, a thought bubble filled with cute emojis (⁄ ⁄ ⁄ω⁄ ⁄ ⁄) and the words “You’re so cute…” appeared in front of Qin.
Qin: ?
